description: Take everything from big excursions to everyday adventures with confidence knowing you have this First Aid Stash + Light by your side. Compact, nearly indestructible, and ready to be packed with essential supplies that can be tailored to your journey using the four aluminum storage refill tins. The built in 4-mode LED Lantern, inclusive of high, medium, red and SOS settings, makes it the ultimate adventure companion, no matter where you roam. Need inspo on what to stash? Read our top five first-aid items to carry in your Stash.
name: VSSL First Aid Mini Stash + Light

specs.value: Ready when you need them, the refillable aluminum tins make it easy for you to keep your first aid supplies organized, personalized and accessible where you’re journey takes you

Their First Aid Stash Light is made of military-grade aluminum and guaranteed to be water resistant, shatterproof, and airtight. That means that if you need your medical supplies, they will be safe, secure, and ready to go
